直接上原理：//give @a minecraft:fishing_rod 1 0 {Unbreakable:1,ench:[{id:19,lvl:1}],display:{Name:"§e§l地雷创造者",Lore:["","§9听说地雷产生的威力高的无法想象 ？ ？","","§5-= 放置地雷 =-","","§9鱼钩上安装了地雷放置器 ， 甩在地上时会自动生成地雷 ， 怪物靠近会爆炸 。 地雷存在30秒 。","","§7Rare Item",""]},Tags:["MineM"],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Amount:68,Operation:0,UUIDMost:1,UUIDLeast:1,Name:max,Slot:mainhand},{AttributeName:generic.attackSpeed,Amount:10000,Operation:1,UUIDMost:1,UUIDLeast:1,Name:max,Slot:mainhand}]}复制代码先给自己一个特殊鱼竿高频：/scoreboard players tag @a add MineM {SelectedItem:{tag:{Tags:["MineM"]}}}复制代码连锁：/scoreboard players tag @a add MineM {Inventory:[{Slot:-106b,tag:{Tags:["MineM"]}}]}复制代码给拿鱼竿的玩家Tag连锁：/execute @e[tag=MineM] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[name=未知] ~ ~ ~ particle flame ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0 2 force复制代码给鱼线加粒子[“未知”是鱼线的名字，MC尿性]连锁：/scoreboard players tag @e[name=未知] add MineL {OnGround:1b}复制代码连锁：/execute @e[name=未知,tag=MineL] ~ ~ ~ summon area_effect_cloud ~ ~0.1 ~ {Tags:["Mine"],Duration:600}复制代码连锁：/kill @e[name=未知]复制代码给落地的鱼线召唤地雷，同时Kill掉落地的鱼线连锁：/scoreboard players tag @a remove MineM复制代码移除玩家tag连锁：/execute @e[tag=Mine] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[r=3,type=!Player,tag=!Mine,c=1] ~ ~ ~ summon fireball ~ ~1 ~ {direction:[0.0,-1.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:3}复制代码连锁：/execute @e[tag=Mine] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[r=3,type=!Player,tag=!Mine,c=1] ~ ~ ~ kill @e[tag=Mine,r=3]复制代码怪物靠近时地雷爆炸连锁：/execute @e[tag=Mine] ~ ~ ~ particle flame ~ ~0.2 ~ 1 0 1 0 8 force复制代码给地雷加粒子感谢大家观看~
